Question: In the 2018 film 'Thugs of Hindostan', which songs are featured and who are the singers of 'Manzoor-e-Khuda'?
Options:
A. A) 'Manzoor-e-Khuda' sung by Arijit Singh and Neha Kakkar
B. B) 'Manzoor-e-Khuda' sung by Shreya Ghoshal, Sunidhi Chauhan, and Sukhwinder Singh
C. C) 'Suraiyya' sung by Shreya Ghoshal and Vishal Dadlani
D. D) 'Suraiyya' sung by Shreya Ghoshal and Arijit Singh
Answer: B) 'Manzoor-e-Khuda' sung by Shreya Ghoshal, Sunidhi Chauhan, and Sukhwinder Singh
